DOC.brief_summary: The objective prospective randomize double blind control study evaluate efficacy safety Sulodexide ( 25 mg ) treatment chronic idiopathic subjective tinnitus .
DOC.brief_title: Sulodexide Efficacy Chronic Idiopathic Subjective Tinnitus
DOC.detailed_description: Patients chronic idiopathic subjective tinnitus , since least 1 year , recruit Ear , Nose Throat ( ENT ) clinic . After verification inclusion exclusion criterion , patient consent enter study assign randomly one follow group : 1- Sulodexide 25 mg 40 day 2- Placebo 40 day . Clinical evaluation patient perform ; tinnitus assess accord Tinnitus Handicap Inventory score , Mini Tinnitus Questionnaire score , combination score . Adverse effect also note . Patients follow 40 day post-treatment outcome measure assess .
